advancements.a_complete_and_utter_destru: Wear the full Lone Graveseeker Armor Set, and hold the Reaper of the Gaol
A Complete and Utter Destruction of the Senses
advancements.alive_in_1865.descr: Craft Dominic Quincey's Fruit Tonic using the Rum-Shattered Whetstone.
advancements.alive_in_1865.title: Felt Alive Since 1865
advancements.all_hail_the_king_of_lazuli: Sever a Lazuli-Enchanted Whetstone from an Evoker whilst having over 30 levels of Experience after drinking the Ambrosia.
All Hail the King of Lazulia
advancements.anarchy_is_royalty_free.des: Craft the Holy Mourning Star using the Wither-Sanctified Whetstone.
advancements.behold.descr: Sever a Thunder-Charged Whetstone from a Creeper within 15 seconds of being struck by lightning after drinking the Ambrosia
advancements.behold.title: Behold!
advancements.bitter_sweet_this_life.desc: Eat the Coagulated Bastard-Blood dropped by a Ghast rescued in the Overworld.
advancements.catastrophic_irony.descr: Sever the Spine of a Death-Lord from a Wither that has witnessed a living and breathing Ender Dragon using a Scythe of Severance.
advancements.catastrophic_irony.title: Catastrophic Irony
advancements.counter_strike.descr: Craft an Emerald Karambit using the Emerald-Tipped Whetstone.
advancements.counter_strike.title: Counter Strike
advancements.cruel_game_of_hot_potato.de: Purchase an Ancient Cull-Blade from a Weaponsmith.
advancements.dead_men_tell_no_tales.desc: Sever an End-Stained Whetstone from an Enderman that was killed whilst not aggressive.
advancements.disturbance_of_the_peace.de: Release an Imprisoned Soul from a Keystone, to your own detriment.
advancements.eater_of_worlds.descr: Craft a Devourer's Forked Tongue using the Flesh-Starved Whetstone.
advancements.eater_of_worlds.title: Eater of Worlds
advancements.exonerator.descr: Sever an Emerald-Tipped Whetstone from a Vindicator nicknamed "Johnny".
advancements.exonerator.title: Exonerator
advancements.flashing_lights.descr: Sever a Water-Shined Whetstone from a Drowned close to a bright light and under the Glowing effect.
advancements.flashing_lights.title: Flashing Lights
advancements.freeze_dried.descr: Sever a Magma-Whipped Whetstone from a Magma Cube inside of Powdered Snow.
advancements.freeze_dried.title: Freeze-Dried
advancements.from_good_to_great.descr: Upgrade your Shotel of Severance to a Scythe of Severance, able to rip off powerful organs and artifacts from bosses under certain conditions
advancements.from_good_to_great.title: From Good To Great
advancements.getaway_package.descr: Craft a Thorned Chorusroot using the Purpur-Floated Whetstone.
advancements.getaway_package.title: Getaway Package
advancements.golden_standard.descr: Sever an Honor-Gilded Whetstone from a Piglin Brute whilst wearing full Golden armor.
advancements.golden_standard.title: Golden Standard
advancements.hurt_me_plenty.descr: Craft a Twinned Netherdagger using a Magma-Whipped Whetstone.
advancements.hurt_me_plenty.title: Hurt Me Plenty
advancements.in_a_better_place_now.descr: Sever an Angel-Stripped Whetstone from a Vex killed above Y-200 after drinking the Ambrosia.
advancements.in_a_better_place_now.title: In a Better Place Now
advancements.its_just_ketchup.descr: Sever a Tear-Bloodied Whetstone from a Ghast after drinking the Ambrosia.
advancements.its_just_ketchup.title: It's Just Ketchup!
advancements.keep_your_promise.descr: Sever a Sakura-Purged Whetstone from the one-hundredth undead monster killed with your Shotel or Scythe after drinking the Ambrosia.
advancements.keep_your_promise.title: Keep Your Promise
advancements.king_for_a_day.descr: Craft a Great-Axe Of Glory using the Honor-Gilded Whetstone.
advancements.king_for_a_day.title: King For a Day
advancements.kingbreaker.descr: Sever the King's Cold Heart from an Elder Guardian in the Nether using a Scythe of Severance.
advancements.kingbreaker.title: Kingbreaker
advancements.look_what_the_cat_dragged_i: Craft the Scorpion Queen's Rapier using the Venom-Stinged Whetstone.
Look What The Cat Dragged In

advancements.lord_of_the_flies.title: Lord of the Flies
advancements.maiden_of_ogygia.descr: Craft the Mariana Scepter using the Water-Shined Whetstone.
advancements.maiden_of_ogygia.title: Maiden of Ogygia
advancements.mass_hysteria_in_murder_cit: Defeat Theron and obtain a Mandible of a Misbegotten.
advancements.matthew_was_right.descr: Sever an Vine-Crept Whetstone from a Creeper that has taken damage from an arrow.
advancements.matthew_was_right.title: Matthew Was Right!
advancements.mysophobia.descr: Sever the Sculk's Patient Zero from a Warden residing in the Earth's Surface with a Scythe of Severance.
advancements.mysophobia.title: Mysophobia
advancements.mystery_in_marble_masquerad: Obtain Marble from an Imprisoned Soul trapped inside Marble Keystones.
advancements.nanomachines_son.descr: Wear the full Adamantine Armor Set, and hold the Teraton Blackhammer
advancements.nanomachines_son.title: Nanomachines, Son
advancements.oh_captain_my_captain.descr: Craft a Sea Guardian Twinblade using the Guardian-Spiked Whetstone.
advancements.oh_captain_my_captain.title: Oh Captain, My Captain!
advancements.ozymandias.descr: Craft the Teraton Blackhammer using the King's Cold Heart.
advancements.ozymandias.title: Ozymandias
advancements.paint_it_black.descr: Find and collect a block of Black Ice from a shrine found in snow biomes.
advancements.paint_it_black.title: Paint It, Black
advancements.pick_your_poison.descr: Sever a Venom-Tipped Whetstone from a Spider while infected with Poison II.
advancements.pick_your_poison.title: Pick Your Poison
advancements.plants_versus_zombies.descr: Craft a Vilethron Pike using the Vine-Crept Whetstone.
advancements.plants_versus_zombies.title: Plants Vs. Zombies
advancements.potionolics_anonymous.descr: Sever a Rum-Shattered Whetstone from a Witch infected with Weakness.
advancements.potionolics_anonymous.title: Potionolics Anonymous
advancements.reapers_finally_callin_my_n: Craft the Reaper of the Gaol using the Sculk's Patient Zero
advancements.serve_the_radiance.descr: Craft the Heavenly Virtue's Shamshir using the Angel-Stripped Whetstone.
advancements.serve_the_radiance.title: Serve The Radiance
advancements.severance.descr: Purchase from a Wandering Trader or craft yourself a Shotel of Severance.
advancements.severance.title: Severance
advancements.shadows_die_twice.descr: Craft the Hanakiba using the Sakura-Purged Whetstone.
advancements.shadows_die_twice.title: Shadows Die Twice
advancements.snakes_and_daggers.descr: Craft the Blood Prince's Flamberge using the Tear-Bloodied Whetstone.
advancements.snakes_and_daggers.title: Snakes and Daggers
advancements.stained_brutal_calamity.des: Craft the Warspear of the Desecrate using the Spine of a Death-Lord
advancements.sword_of_one_who_confronts_: Craft the Dragonslayer using the Mind of Jean.
§6The Sword Of One Who Confronts Death§5
advancements.tastes_like_promotion.descr: Drink the Ambrosia found deep within the Wither's corpse.
advancements.tastes_like_promotion.title: Tastes Like Promotion
advancements.thats_a_sin_you_know.descr: Sever a Wither-Sanctified Whetstone from a Wither Skeleton whilst airborne after drinking the Ambrosia.
advancements.thats_a_sin_you_know.title: That's a Sin, You Know
advancements.the_fallen_leaves_tell_a_st: Wear the full Death Prince Armor Set, and hold the Warspear of the Desecrator
The Fallen Leaves Tell A Story
advancements.the_god_of_thunder.descr: Craft the Mjolnir using the Thunder-Charged Whetstone.
advancements.the_god_of_thunder.title: The God Of Thunder!
advancements.the_iron_giant.descr: Defeat Adam Holdsworth and obtain Raw Adamantium
advancements.the_iron_giant.title: The Iron Giant
advancements.the_mind_electric.descr: Sever the Mind of Jean from the Ender Dragon by slaying with one of the three legendary armaments.
advancements.the_mind_electric.title: The Mind Electric
advancements.the_power_glove.descr: Craft a Dead Man's Glove using the End-Stained Whetstone.
advancements.the_power_glove.title: The Power Glove
advancements.three_fingered_madness.desc: Craft the Flame-Frenzied Claymore using the Blaze-Frenzied Whetstone.
advancements.triple_kill.descr: Sever a Guardian-Spiked Whetstone after killed three Guardians within 8 seconds of each other.
advancements.triple_kill.title: Triple Kill
advancements.triumphant.descr: Sever a Purpur-Floated Whetstone from a Shulker whilst you are levitating.
advancements.triumphant.title: Triumphant
advancements.united_in_treason.descr: Defeat Damon XIV, and obtain a Desecrated Stonecrown.
advancements.united_in_treason.title: United In Treason
advancements.voidwalking_wraith.descr: Craft the Lazulian Order Kunai using the Lazuli-Enchanted Whetstone.
advancements.voidwalking_wraith.title: Voidwalker
advancements.youve_got_nothing_on_me.des: Sever a Blaze-Frenzied Whetstone from a Blaze after facing it whilst under Fire Resistance.
block.armamentarium.black_ice.descriptio: §7§oThe densest form of ice, forged under extraterrestial pressure whilst cooled
§7§onear absolute zero. In this form, it's around fifty times heavier than regular
§7§oice, aswell as having a pitch-black hue. Venerated by ancient civilizations
§7§ofor its unearthly presence, it can be seen with shrines dedicated to blocks
§7§oof it in snow biomes, with no trace of exactly how it was harvested.
§7§oAn ancient keystone containing the imprisoned soul of §fAdam Holdsworth§7,
§7an almost indestructible warrior able to threaten a kingdom with his mere
§7presence. This shook the old Death-Lord's reign, leading to his imprisonment
§7high atop mountains so his soul could be close to the heavens, an act of mercy.
block.armamentarium.keystone_lone_graves: §7§oAn ancient keystone containing the imprisoned soul of §fTheron§7,
§7§oa misbegotten assassin who attempted to murder the old Death-Lord,
§7§ocast into a deep forest as punishment for this act.
block.armamentarium.keystone.description: §7§oAn empty, hollow keystone. It's ability to imprison souls under an owner's
§7§oname seems to linger, letting you lock only one monster's soul inside it.
death.attack.assassination.player: %1$s was assassinated whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.doom.item: %1$s sensed an impending doom while %2$s was using %3$s
death.attack.doom.player: %1$s sensed an impending doom whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.electrocution.player: %1$s was electrocuted whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.frenzied_burn.item: %1$s was consumed by the flame %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.frenzied_burn.player: %1$s was consumed by the flame whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.hangover.item: %1$s was killed by a hangover caused by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.hangover.player: %1$s died of a hangover whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.hemorrhage.item: %1$s suffered intense blood-loss caused by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.hemorrhage.player: %1$s suffered intense blood-loss whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.lovecraftian.item: %1$s was doomed to witness horrors beyond their comprehension by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.lovecraftian.player: %1$s witnessed horrors beyond their comprehension whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.suicide.player: %1$s killed themself whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.venom.item: %1$s succumbed to a lethal venom injected by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.venom.player: %1$s succumbed to a lethal venom whilst trying to escape %2$s

item.armamentarium.adam_template.descrip: §7§oHeroic artifact able to align Adamantium crystal structures on broad Netherite
§7§oplating. This level of power was only ever achieved by Adam Holdsworth, crafting
§7§oan armor so powerful that led to his imprisonment into a Keystone high above
§7§omountains, a graceless act of mercy by the Death-Lord. Luckily, his tyranny is long gone.
item.armamentarium.adamantine_boots.desc: §7Each armor piece of this set grants you an extra §f5 Health §7and
§eFull Set Bonus - For Honor, For Glory!
§7alongside extend the duration of the §dTeraton Blackhammer's
item.armamentarium.adamantine_chestplate: §7Each armor piece of this set grants you an extra §f5 Health §7and
§eFull Set Bonus - For Honor, For Glory!
§7alongside extend the duration of the §dTeraton Blackhammer's
item.armamentarium.adamantine_helmet.des: §7Each armor piece of this set grants you an extra §f5 Health §7and
§eFull Set Bonus - For Honor, For Glory!
§7alongside extend the duration of the §dTeraton Blackhammer's
item.armamentarium.adamantine_leggings.d: §7Each armor piece of this set grants you an extra §f5 Health §7and
§eFull Set Bonus - For Honor, For Glory!
§7alongside extend the duration of the §dTeraton Blackhammer's
item.armamentarium.ambrosia.description_: §7§oThe drink of the gods, stolen from them by the king of an ancient
§7§ocivilization ravaged by the Wither. Drinking this, you gain the ability to
§7§osever Advanced Whetstones from specific mobs in specific conditions.
item.armamentarium.ancient_cullblade.des: §7§oPrehistoric artifact collected by Weaponsmiths, cursed with the ability
§7§oto make anyone stung by its blade disappear, with the blade going with it.
item.armamentarium.angel_whetstone.descr: §7§oAdvanced Whetstone stripped of full heavenly power, able to stain a
§7§ofeathered blade with some of god's light, capable of summoning Angels.
item.armamentarium.blaze_whetstone.descr: §7§oWhetstone frenzying with the Blaze's fire, able to turn a hilt of
§7§onether-material into a maddening blade of pure frenzied flame.
item.armamentarium.blood_prince_flamberg: §7Heal §f10% §7of the damage dealt with this sword when attacking.
§7Attacks build up §fBlood Loss§7. Once enough of this stacks, instantly
§7destroying §f10% §7of an enemy's max health, resetting the counter.
§7Cast out a projection of your sword, dealing §f13 §7damage and activating
§7both passive abilities of the weapon. Enemies damaged by this ability
§7are briefly blinded, making them almost unable to track players.
item.armamentarium.blood_whetstone.descr: §7§oAdvanced Whetstone taking form off of a severed organ, becoming sharper and
§7§ostiffer the sadder a Ghast's life has been. Depressingly, this one's as hard as steel
item.armamentarium.coagulated_netherbloo: §7§oIn reality, this is just a Ghast's premature fetus. Their gestation involves intense
§7§ocaloric sacrifice, in order to create a airborne creature that large. Now that
§7§oit has been harvested, its development is deemed impossible, and is infact
§7§oknown as a delicacy to surface-dwellers in this world.
item.armamentarium.damon_template.descri: §7§oHeirloom carrying the sigil of the royal family Damon was a part of, one of the
§7§ofew things he held on to before being banished into a Keystone. The power this
§7§oitem holds is thought to be one of the few remaining shreds of the Death-Lord's
§7§omagic, able to bend Netherite plating into a copy of Damon XIV's royal armor.
item.armamentarium.dead_mans_glove.descr: §7The gloves fit perfectly, making your punches immensely powerful.
§7However, your fighting style heavily limits your range.
§7Cast a projection of the enderman that died to forge this glove,
§7teleporting you where it lands. If it lands on an enemy, gain a short
§7damage multiplier in return for reduce defenses.
item.armamentarium.death_prince_boots.de: §7For each piece of this armor, gain §f+1.5 Attack Damage §7and an extra
§f+5% §7Attack Speed. Additionally, the §fBlood Loss §7build-up of the
§dWarspear of the Desecrator §7is increased by §f10% §7per piece.
§eFull Set Bonus - The Mark of a True Lord
§7Every ability's cooldown of the §dWarspear of the Desecrator §7is reduced
§7to half; additionally your range holding the spear is increased by §f1 §7block.
§7Any and all physical attacks now build up §fCombo§7, powering up successively.
item.armamentarium.death_prince_chestpla: §7For each piece of this armor, gain §f+1.5 Attack Damage §7and an extra
§f+5% §7Attack Speed. Additionally, the §fBlood Loss §7build-up of the
§dWarspear of the Desecrator §7is increased by §f10% §7per piece.
§eFull Set Bonus - The Mark of a True Lord
§7Every ability's cooldown of the §dWarspear of the Desecrator §7is reduced
§7to half; additionally your range holding the spear is increased by §f1 §7block.
§7Any and all physical attacks now build up §fCombo§7, powering up successively.
item.armamentarium.death_prince_helmet.d: §7For each piece of this armor, gain §f+1.5 Attack Damage §7and an extra
§f+5% §7Attack Speed. Additionally, the §fBlood Loss §7build-up of the
§dWarspear of the Desecrator §7is increased by §f10% §7per piece.
§eFull Set Bonus - The Mark of a True Lord
§7Every ability's cooldown of the §dWarspear of the Desecrator §7is reduced
§7to half; additionally your range holding the spear is increased by §f1 §7block.
§7Any and all physical attacks now build up §fCombo§7, powering up successively.
item.armamentarium.death_prince_leggings: §7For each piece of this armor, gain §f+1.5 Attack Damage §7and an extra
§f+5% §7Attack Speed. Additionally, the §fBlood Loss §7build-up of the
§dWarspear of the Desecrator §7is increased by §f10% §7per piece.
§eFull Set Bonus - The Mark of a True Lord
§7Every ability's cooldown of the §dWarspear of the Desecrator §7is reduced
§7to half; additionally your range holding the spear is increased by §f1 §7block.
§7Any and all physical attacks now build up §fCombo§7, powering up successively.
item.armamentarium.desecrated_stonecrown: §7§oWhat's left of Damon XIV's crown, after the Death-Lord tarnished his royalty and banished
§7§ohim into a Keystone in the Nether after forming a revolutionary party against the King.
§7§oThis offense led to a harsher punishment than Theron's, as somehow attempting an
§7§oassassination hurt less than the Prince attempting to dethrown his father. This crown
§7§ois what little is left from Damon, it may perhaps be used to replicate his cruel command...
item.armamentarium.devourers_forked_tong: §7Hurting a passive animal causes a primal instinct to trigger, making you
§7swallow the animal whole, feeding you almost to completion.
§7Activate a state of near possession, where your ability to deal damage is
§7multiplied by §f1.5x §7and attacks swing faster. However, during this state,
§7your hunger grows, luckily for you, attacks feed you.
item.armamentarium.dragonslayer.descript: §ePassive - Bane of the All-Soaring
§7Deal an extra §f15 §7damage to any entity that is airborne.
§ePassive - Draconic Healing Factor
§7When taking above two hearst of damage while holding
§7this sword, be granted with a temporary §fAbsorption §7effect.
§eAbility - Berserker's Rage §f| SNEAK-HIT
§7Striking an enemy when sneaking delivers a slightly less powerful
§7blow, but instead it launches them up into the air with no mercy.
§8Only works on §4grounded §8targets.
§eAbility - Pierce The Soil §f| BLOCK-HIT
§7Spear through Mother Earth's body sending a shockwave through the
§7ground, dealing §f19 §7damage and launching enemies into the sky.
§8Charges: §a3  §8Recharge Time: §28s
§eAbility - May Heaven Fall Upon Thee §f| SHIFT-RIGHT-CLICK
§7Focus the dragonborne energy in the blade of your sword into a
§7projection of Jean's wrath. Wherever this energy lands becomes the
§7victim of a barrage of draconic meteors that rain endlessly without a
§7shred of mercy. This storm lasts for §f12 §7seconds where you summoned it.
§8Cooldown: §b24s
§eAbility - Death Defiance §f| ON-DEATH
§7When you die holding this sword, your soul will be transported to the
§7exact position of your death to fight back. Once brought back, you will be
§7granted a boost to every single attribute that can be applied to your body.
§8Persistent Cooldown: §d2m  §8Timer Resets on Death
§8When dying in a modded dimension, the sword fails to bring you to that
§8destination; instead, it uses the energy dedicated to transporting you to extend
§8the duration of the boost to your stats, from 30 seconds to 2 minutes.
item.armamentarium.emerald_karambit.desc: §7Chance to dig up treasure from aggressive
§7mobs when attacked. Treasure may consist of
§7At the cost of an emerald, roll a dice that
§7decides whether your next attack will be granted
§7a boost or nerf to the damage, based on the result
item.armamentarium.emerald_whetstone.des: §7§oWhetstone tipped with fine emerald dust, able to sharpen a pure
§7§oemerald chunk into a sharp knifeblade; something impossible to most.
item.armamentarium.end_whetstone.descrip: §7§oWhetstone stained with the mark of an Enderman, able to turn pieces of cloth
§7§oand stone into a lethal manifestation of the wrath held by the lost man you killed.
item.armamentarium.flame_frenzied_claymo: §7Set enemies ablaze with a slower but inextinguishable
§7flame, leaving no trace of fire ever touching the skin.
§7Concentrate an insane flame, then send a barrage of
§7fire across a vast distance, akin to that of a Blaze.
item.armamentarium.flesh_whetstone.descr: §7§oWhetstone carved from the bones of a gluttonous husk, still echoing
§7§othe growls of a hungered bowl. Try keeping it well away from skin...
item.armamentarium.gilded_whetstone.desc: §7§oWhetstone lined with some of the purest gold found in the entire globe,
§7§oable to make a whole army fight for glory knowing some purity still lives.
item.armamentarium.greataxe_of_glory.des: §7Attacking an enemy places a random stat raising buff on you, and
§7a stat-lowering nerf on the victim, lasting a small amount of time.
§7Yell out a cold command to nearby enemies, if any who witnessed it
§7are inflicted with any stat-lowering nerf native to any armament, then
§7they will be §fDamnified§7, causing them to take an extra §f4 §7damage
§7from the next attack they take for every unique nerf they currently have.
§7This makes the effects expire instantly, but can always be reapplied.
item.armamentarium.guardian_whetstone.de: §7§oWhetstone spiked with Guardian proteins, mistakable for artifical creation;
§7§o able to forge a twinbladed weapon capable of compounding damage dealt.
item.armamentarium.hanakiba.description_: §7When attacking an undead enemy, gain a §fdouble
§7damage multiplier for subsequent attacks. When attacking
§7any non-undead enemy, you suffer a punishment to your blade
§7for betraying your task to cleanse the world of the undead.
§7Fly through the direction you look at, instantly killing
item.armamentarium.heavenly_virtues_sham: §7Borrow an army of angels from the skies to fight for
§7you for a brief period of time.
§7Exhaust all of your energy to fly into the sky, and then cast
§7a barrage of angels down at the ground, decimating your target.
item.armamentarium.holy_mourning_star.de: §7When smiting an enemy, use divine intervention to shred
§7down their armor, erasing their ability to negate damage.
§7Hold your mace high into the sky, blessing you with a one time
§ftriple §7boost to your damage. Landing this hit when still airborne
§7will launch you again until your combo ends.
item.armamentarium.kings_cold_heart.desc: §7§oThe cruel black heart of the ocean monument's emperor,
§7§oone that may only be severed from the body of the Elder Guardian
§7§owhen exposed to the excruciating hot winds of the Nether.
item.armamentarium.lazulian_order_kunai_: §ePassive - Size Matters
§7The small size of the daggers make reaching targets harder.
§eAbility - Mind Piercer §f| RIGHT-CLICK
§7Shoot out one of your daggers as a projectile, upon landing on an enemy,
§7deal §f8 §7damage. This projectile buries into the enemy it lands on, making
§7it difficult for them to follow you, lowering speed and follow range.
§8Charges: §a4 §8Recharge Time: §22s
§eAbility - Call of Purgatory §f| SHIFT-RIGHT-CLICK
§7Communicate with all nearby enemies with daggers buried deep within
§7them, causing said daggers to run through their organs and cause deep
§7lacerations and internal bleeding. This reduces their max health by §f25%,
§7and deals health depending on how much health the enemy has.
§8Charges: §b12s
§bLazulian Order Kunai
§ePassive - Size Matters
§7The small size of the daggers make reaching targets harder.
§eAbility - Mind Piercer §f| RIGHT-CLICK
§7Shoot out one of your daggers as a projectile, upon landing on an enemy,
§7deal §f8 §7damage. This projectile buries into the enemy it lands on, making
§7it difficult for them to follow you, lowering speed and follow range.
§8Charges: §a4 §8Recharge Time: §22s
§eAbility - Call of Purgatory §f| SHIFT-RIGHT-CLICK
§7Communicate with all nearby enemies with daggers buried deep within
§7them, causing said daggers to run through their organs and cause deep
§7lacerations and internal bleeding. This reduces their max health by §f25%,
§7and deals health depending on how much health the enemy has.
§8Charges: §b12s
§bLazulian Order Kunai
§ePassive - Size Matters
§7The small size of the daggers make reaching targets harder.
§eAbility - Mind Piercer §f| RIGHT-CLICK
§7Shoot out one of your daggers as a projectile, upon landing on an enemy,
§7deal §f8 §7damage. This projectile buries into the enemy it lands on, making
§7it difficult for them to follow you, lowering speed and follow range.
§8Charges: §a4 §8Recharge Time: §22s

item.armamentarium.lazulian_whetstone.de: §7§oAdvanced Whetstone sharpened off from an idol, belonging to the Lazulian Order.
§7§oWho what or where they originate from is unknown, apart from overheard whispers.

§7the range at which you interact with blocks by §f1§7. Additionally, when striking
§7an enemy that has yet to spot you, deal an extra §f3 §7damage per piece.
§7Form a complete symbiosis with the Sculk, making you gain twice as many
§csouls §7using the §dReaper of the Gaol§7, doubling the duration of its §eSoulflare

item.armamentarium.magma_whetstone.descr: §7§oWhetstone whipped with delicious magma cream, able to turn scraps
§7§oof nether material into a dagger that thrives in the utmost chaos.
item.armamentarium.mandible_of_a_misbego: §7§oThe Death-Lord's assassin is an odd specimen, currently the only known organism
§7§oable to form a perfect symbiosis with the Sculk. This connection led to a near destruction
§7§oof his skull's structural integrity, replacing most of the bone with pure sculk fibers. Leaving
§7§othe jaw as the only piece of real bone left in his body, as what he least used, as he never
§7§ospoke. What's left of his strain of virus could likely be repurposed...
item.armamentarium.mariana_scepter.descr: §7Beam a slow line of projectile that slowly lowers the health
§7of the target. The faster you click, the faster you shoot.
§7This ability will leave mobs at 1 HP and cannot harm players.
§7Throw out a concentrated orb of light, that explodes on
§7impact dealing §f12 §7damage to nearby enemies around it.
item.armamentarium.mjolnir.description_2: §7Upon hit, generate a short burst of §fCharge§7,
item.armamentarium.mjolnir.description_3: §7boosting a few offensive stats and allowing the use
item.armamentarium.mjolnir.description_4: §7of other abilities. This length of §fCharge §7can stack.
item.armamentarium.mjolnir.description_7: §7Use up §f8 §7seconds of §fCharge §7to power the winds around
item.armamentarium.mjolnir.description_8: §7you, causing swings to launch small bursts of electricity, dealing
item.armamentarium.mjolnir.description_9: §f6 §7damage each. Every swing costs you §f2 §7seconds of §fCharge§7.
item.armamentarium.mjolnir.description_1: §7Concentrate all of your charge into your hammer, making the
§7next spawn a field of electricity that purges any non-player entities
§7in the area. This requires atleast §f30 §7seconds of §fCharge §7to produce, and
§7every extra §f10 §7seconds powers up your next attack, at a cap of §f+18
§7extra damage when used with §f1 §7minute and §f30 §7seconds of §fCharge§7.
item.armamentarium.purpur_whetstone.desc: §7§oWhetstone floated from fresh shulkern purpur, able to fine tune a
§7§oa stem of chorus into a sharp and devilish dagger with levitation properties.
item.armamentarium.raw_adamantium.descri: §7§oPure Adamantium straight from the myths, clocking in at a Mohs hardness of 17.6.
§7§oOnly issue is that with a material this strong, it's impossible to break, mold, or melt into
§7§oany kind of weapon. Yet, somehow, a hero managed to forge an armor so perfect
§7§oit led to the lord of his kingdom banishing him deep into a mountain jail to protect
§7§ohis throne from an armor so inpenetrable...
item.armamentarium.reaper_of_the_gaol.de: §7Become fully invisible when sneaking, without any visible trace.
§7Killing an enemy releases their §cSoul, §7which you capture with your weapon.
§7These §cSouls §7are used as fuel for other abilities. Once collected, they become
§7intertwined with your soul, making them impossible to lose unless used up.
§7Channel part of your soulcount into §f+50% Attack Speed §7for §f8 §7seconds.
§7Channel a sliver of your soulcount into a large piercing slash projectile,
§7traveling a large distance dealing §f20 §7damage to all who are perforated.
§7Sacrifice a great part of your soulcount to cut the remaining health of
§7all enemies near and far by §f1/2. §7This effect puts a short-lasting effect on
item.armamentarium.rum_coconut.descripti: §7Hurl the glass forward that explodes, with varying effects depending on
§7the drink's flavor. The bottle seems to reappear, but with a different flavor.
§7Drinking this bottle gives you a random effect depending on the flavor,
§7and also reappears in your hand. It will saturate, but not feed you.
item.armamentarium.rum_lime.description_: §7Hurl the glass forward that explodes, with varying effects depending on
§7the drink's flavor. The bottle seems to reappear, but with a different flavor.
§7Drinking this bottle gives you a random effect depending on the flavor,
§7and also reappears in your hand. It will saturate, but not feed you.
item.armamentarium.rum_orange.descriptio: §7Hurl the glass forward that explodes, with varying effects depending on
§7the drink's flavor. The bottle seems to reappear, but with a different flavor.
§7Drinking this bottle gives you a random effect depending on the flavor,
§7and also reappears in your hand. It will saturate, but not feed you.
item.armamentarium.rum_passion.descripti: §7Hurl the glass forward that explodes, with varying effects depending on
§7the drink's flavor. The bottle seems to reappear, but with a different flavor.
§7Drinking this bottle gives you a random effect depending on the flavor,
§7and also reappears in your hand. It will saturate, but not feed you.
item.armamentarium.rum_pineapple.descrip: §7Hurl the glass forward that explodes, with varying effects depending on
§7the drink's flavor. The bottle seems to reappear, but with a different flavor.
§7Drinking this bottle gives you a random effect depending on the flavor,
§7and also reappears in your hand. It will saturate, but not feed you.
item.armamentarium.rum_strawberry.descri: §7Hurl the glass forward that explodes, with varying effects depending on
§7the drink's flavor. The bottle seems to reappear, but with a different flavor.
§7Drinking this bottle gives you a random effect depending on the flavor,
§7and also reappears in your hand. It will saturate, but not feed you.
item.armamentarium.rum_whetstone.descrip: §7§oWhetstone with an almost perfect sharp edge, born only from a shattered bottle of
§7§oclear glass. Smells oddly like a fine vintage rum, what kind of witch was that?
item.armamentarium.sakura_whetstone.desc: §7§oAdvanced Whetstone purged of impurity using the blessings of the Cherry
§7§oBlossom spirits, able to forge a katana with one mission: kill every undead.
§7§oAdvanced Whetstone made of sanctified withered bones, able to
§7§oturn the sacramental power of a Nether Star into a sinful force of nature.
item.armamentarium.scorpion_queens_rapie: §7Inject your target with a lethal venom, that gets stronger the
§7longer it has infected a target. Continuous injections increases the
§7Throw a ball of sludge from the tip of your rapier, containing a far more
§7potent form of venom that spreads across where it lands. This lasts for
§7a short duration, but quickly attacking an affected foe will extend its duration.
item.armamentarium.sculk_patient_zero.de: §7§oThe hand of the first victim consumed by the sculk, an agonizing
§7§ofungus that drains off the lifeforce of organisms. Can only be severed
§7§ofrom the Warden when it is exposed to direct sunlight on the surface.
item.armamentarium.sea_guardian_twinblad: §7Consecutive hits between a short period of time
§7builds up a §fCombo§7, raising your offensive stats
§7Use up all of your §fCombo §7to channel it into a fast,
§7infinitely-piercing projectile who's damage is based on how
item.armamentarium.severance_scythe.desc: §7to drop from specific mobs or bosses.
§7This weapon derives many experience orbs from
§7simply slicing at an enemy; on top of this, the weapon comes
§7preemptively enchanted with a very high level of Looting.
item.armamentarium.severance_shotel.desc: §8The Advancement Page might help teach you how...
§7This weapon derives few experience orbs from
§7simply slicing at an enemy; on top of this, the weapon comes
§7preemptively enchanted with a low level of Looting.
item.armamentarium.spine_of_a_death_lord: §7§oThe spinal coord of a being who lives to bring death upon the
§7§oworld; splitting into three to control the three heads it uses to rain death.
§7§oIt may only be severed from a Wither that has breathed the air from
§7§otwo or more different dimensions during its existence.
item.armamentarium.teraton_blackhammer.d: §ePassive - Momentum
§7Killing an enemy adds a brief period of increased attack speed that stacks.
§ePassive - Absolute Unit
§7Become invulnerable to knockback, and increase your
§fArmor Toughness §7by §f50% §7when holding the hammer.
§eAbility - Bastion Breaker §f| SHIFT-RIGHT-CLICK
§7Crash on the ground with enough force to make you and nearby
§7enemies jump out of the ground. These enemies will be paralyzed for
§7a short duration of time. This ability makes attacks faster briefly.
§8Cooldown: §b8s
§eAbility - Dark Ice Drifter §f| RIGHT-CLICK
§7Wind up and launch yourself in a direction using the weight of your
§7hammer, sending a shockwave where you land. This ability gives a
§7a brief period of §fResistance II§7, lasting only §f3 §7seconds.
§8Charges: §a3   §8Recharge Time: §210s
§eAbility - Impervious §f| PRESS-C
§7Coat your body with pure crystal black ice, forming a perfect biological
§7connection between you and the hammer. This connection halves the
§7cooldowns of the weapon, and the black ice coating provides insane defensive
§7properties, cutting damage taken by §f40% §7and armor points by §f15.
§7This lasts for §f15 §7seconds.
§8Cooldown: §b40s
item.armamentarium.the_adamantine_spawn_: Adam Holdsworth, the Conqueror Spawn Egg
item.armamentarium.the_death_prince_spaw: Damon XIV, the Prince of Death Spawn Egg
item.armamentarium.the_lone_graveseeker_: Theron, the King's Grave Assassin Spawn Egg
item.armamentarium.the_mind_of_jean.desc: §7§oThe central processing unit of the End's dethroned tyrant, Jean. Its ephemeral
§7§onature makes it rot instantly upon the dragon's death, as if it were a separate
§7§oorganism. Only by slaying an Ender Dragon with one of the three legendary
§7§oarmaments, this brain can remain intact after the death one of Jean's puppets.
item.armamentarium.theron_template.descr: §7§oArtifact with the capability to modify the genetic composition of highly-intelligent
§7§osculk strains, able to host on the toughest of metals, such as Netherite. With the
§7§oright specimen, such as the variant Theron carried, it could even mold the armor
§7§ointo something completely different, an attire capable of forming a symbiosis.
item.armamentarium.thorned_chorus_root.d: §7Release a cloud of pollen that causes you and a
§7nearby creature to levitate for a short period of time.
§7Dig the plant's thorns deep into your flesh, causing it
§7to teleport you an unpredictable amount of block backwards
§7, in true chorus fashion. This comes at a price of some health,
§7and provides some defensive buffs in this process.
item.armamentarium.thunder_whetstone.des: §7§oAdvanced Whetstone charged with pure Asgardian thunder, with enough
§7§ogodstained essence to create a replica of the Norse god of thunder's hammer.
§7When in the nether, your damage is §fdoubled
§7if and only if this weapon is being held.
§7Shoot out an explosive fireball using the underworld
§7originating energy in the air. This fireball acts similarly
item.armamentarium.venomous_whetstone.de: §7§oWhetstone seared with a very lethal venom, coming from an extinct species
§7§odominated by Spiders; with this, you may craft a weapon that thrusts venom deep into enemies.
item.armamentarium.vilethorn_pike.descri: §7Quickly shoot out three small dynamite projectiles produced by the
§7spear, exploding with an area-of-effect damage burst.
item.armamentarium.vine_of_agony.descrip: §7§oSeems to hold the power to eliminate greatness.
item.armamentarium.vine_of_glory.descrip: §7§oSeems to hold the power to grant omnipotence.
item.armamentarium.vine_whetstone.descri: §7§oWhetstone overgrown with thin strings of moss that feels almost electric
§7§oto the touch; better be careful to keep this well away from open flames.
item.armamentarium.warspear_of_the_desec: §ePassive - Veincleaving Vanguard
§7Your attacks are extended by §f2 §7blocks, and build up §fBlood Loss§7.
§eAbility - Impending Doom §f| ON-HIT
§7On successive hits to one enemy, add §f5 §7damage to a counter that
§7gets released and crushes the enemy after §f3 §7seconds of not attacking.
§8Max Impending Doom damage: §450
§eAbility - Withered Javelin §f| RIGHT-CLICK
§7Ready up and throw a withered projection of your spear. This swift
§7projectile strikes with §f16 §7damage and leaves the target with a lethal
§7strain of §fWither§7, four times as potent as the kind Wither Skeletons use.
§8Cooldown: §b8s
§eAbility - Heart-Skewer Thrust §f| SHIFT-RIGHT-CLICK
§7Gather up courage and thrust your spear to its fullest potential, creating
§7a large piercing attack that deals §f30 §7damage and launches all enemies
§7it hurts with great strength.
§8Cooldown: §b10s
§eAbility - Pure Annihilation §f| PRESS-C
§7Ignite the deathseeking lifeblood that surges in your spear, letting it fly
§7through the air taking you with it. When you choose to land, strike down
§7and deal §f40 §7damage to enemies around you. However, that damage
§7cannot kill, and would leave enemies with only §f1 §7HP if it was supposed
§7to kill them. Spending more than §f8 §7seconds airborne stops you midair.
§8Cooldown: §b24s
§dWar-Spear of the Desecrator
item.armamentarium.water_whetstone.descr: §7§oWhetstone shining with clear liquid light, able to enchant bones and
§7§oprismarine into a beautiful staff that casts pure beauty into a weapon.
